thread.title: Taalia Harper
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Taalia Harper

author: Taalia Harper
title: Taalia Harper
text: Brian the store manager in North Haven really really lived up to his name today, I must say he took responsibility within my situation and helped me all the way I went in for one issue came out with 4 issues What I loved about the service I received I was updated every step of the way and within one lunch break. I spoke with Brian a day before he promised he would order the part as he did and got to work for me the next day I really appreciate the service and the timing this store did to make me a very happy and loyal customer thank you so much NORTH HAVEN STORE... I will keep my promise and get all you guys lunch thank you I really really appreciate you guys
